places_with_reviews.name: Dhana line hotel and family restaurant
address: Shiv mandir chowk, Naya nagar banni, Maheshkhunt, Banni, Bihar 851214, India

reviews.text: Good food with best quality service.।।
Good place for lunch and breakfast

One of the best restaurant in bihar with very good taste of of foods at reasonable price , the sitting are is also cool and comfortable  and nice and hygiene arrangements of washroom , the behavior of owner as well as working staff's very polite and  there is also good parking space in front of the hotel so you'll don't need to find parking space for your vehicle it is just in the main side of the road so it will be find by anyone easily , there are lots of food items available here but if you visit here anytime don't forget to try This Hotel's famous Dish Panner Butter Masala  ,the taste of this is just waooo.....
Here you will get home like tea and Food .It is a little expensive.
Good and tasty  food. But service is little poor.

reviews.text: Woow hotel in our area . Must visit and enjoy the services.The hotel staff are also very polite. The marriage hall and dining area is also lavish and beautiful.The Hotel rooms are also neat and clean and well furnished as well.
